# Insect Jar Technique

## Quick Facts
- Classification: Hiden~Aburame Clan, Ninjutsu
- Class: Defensive
- Range: Short
- Users: Shino Aburame
- Media: Anime, Game

## Summary
A technique capable of protecting against attacks by using kikaichÅ« to fly in a dome shape at high speed, similar to the Eight Trigrams Palms Revolving Heaven. While proving defensive, a sufficient amount of explosive force can break through it.
